name: Hopscotch (itch)
description:
*Disclaimer* This is a university project, for Des-203 made by Group 27 for Abertay university. We do not profit from the game and it is free to download! 

This is not a finished product, just a vertical slice!

You play a frog in a swamp, saving flies from the evil rat gangsters the Ratscallions. You must overcome many obstacles and must save all the flies, before it's too late.

I wish you luck on your and Frobert's journey!

We hope you enjoy the game as much as we did making it.
